translation.title: Ninni & Eino
translation.site_description: Quick and basic RTL localization demo!
translation.description: Eino and Ninni are Oriental Shorthair cats that love to sleep and play together
translation.ninni_info: Ninni is a two year old cat that likes to eat everything and unfortunately everything that is made from plastic. She is a bit smaller than Eino but despite that much louder and active. She is very vocal and social and let's you know if the food bowl is empty.
translation.eino_info: Eino is a 5 year old cat. Fetching toys and eating popcorn is Eino's expertise. He always watches and follows around Ninni to make sure that she's fine whether Ninni likes it or not.
